newValue.text: Implement error boundary or fallback for cache failures in getTrades and getTrade

snapshot.title: Fix Swallowed Cache Errors in Trades Actions
snapshot.description: Redis errors are caught and logged but not bubbled up in src/lib/actions/trades.ts (getTrades and getTrade). Implement a more robust error boundary or fallback strategy for the caching layer.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Implement error boundary or fallback for cache failures in getTrades and getTrade
